=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours -
4 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |- ! Mulch and Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
